text: Gena the Crocodile () is a 1969 Soviet animated movie directed by Roman Kachanov.От политплакатов до авторского искусства. Как развивалась отечественная мультипликацияЧЕБУРАШКА И КРОКОДИЛ ГЕНА (1969-1983) ==Actors== *Vasily Livanov as Gena the Crocodile (voice) *Klara Rumyanova as Cheburashka (voice) *Vladimir Rautbart as Shapoklyak (voice) *Vladimir Kenigson as Salesman (voice) *Tamara Dmitrieva as Galya (voice) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1969 movies Category:1960s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies Category:Movies about crocodiles Category:Movies directed by Roman Kachanov
title: Gena the Crocodile (movie)
